Attacks.Name: Peck
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Nidoran♂ gains power equal to the damage dealt. Wild: The target gains the Bleed special condition.

Attacks.Name: Poison Sting
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled, the target gains the Poison special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Poison Point
Superpowers.Effect: When Nidoran♂ is targeted by a physical attack and the attacker rolls a wild, the attacking character gains the Poison special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Quick Dodge
Superpowers.Effect: Nidoran♂ may advance S after being targeted by an enemy attack. This superpower can be used only once per turn.

Attacks.Name: Horn Attack
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled, the target is pushed S before damage is dealt.

Superpowers.Name: Venom Surge
Superpowers.Effect: Choose an enemy character within Range 2. The chosen character suffers 1 damage and gains the Poison special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Evolution
Superpowers.Effect: Replace this character with a Nidorino character of the same injured status. The new character begins with damage equal to the damage on this character and power equal to the power on this character.
